author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tamilar Desiya Munnani president Pazha Nedumaran has urged the Tamil Nadu Government to fix a deadline for the completion of Avinashi Athikadavu Ground Water Recharge Scheme and publish it in the gazette.

The State Government should hold talks with the representatives of government staff who are on an indefinite strike, he told reporters here.

A High Court monitored committee should probe the death of IPS officer N. Harish at Chennai.

Terming the attack on student at Jawaharlal Nehru University as murder of democracy he said that Prime Minister Narendra Modi should ensure that the culprits did not escape punishment.
title: Fix deadline for water scheme: Pazha Nedumaran
